name: Bucketeer!
description:
I made this game in about a week during the Coronavirus Quarantine.

I wanted to make it a massive idle game complete with a shop, dancing monkeys and crab enemies. But in order to finish the game I decided to cut my original idea in half... Then cut it in half again... And again...

Anyways I hope you enjoy this little project. I might expand on it in the future, make a sequel, release it on the Google Play Store. Who knows?
